function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased foot traffic in restaurants and cafes","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited education and awareness about public health and environmental hygiene","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakness in hospital services during a crisis","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of hotlines and sponsored advertisements for disease education","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies using mathematical modelling for simulations and predictions may present a risk of bias in the review","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited coordination of site deliveries leading to higher contact and potential transmission","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between employee engagement initiatives and health and safety protocols, leading to a compromised environment for disease transmission control","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of fomites","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in population size making it challenging to monitor the emergence of infections within a community from wastewater","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants may have low compliance with covid-19 mitigation measures, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate physical distancing","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of germicidal irradiation in civil buildings","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of hospital acquired infections","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient preparation for future pandemics","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposing consumers to covid-19 through dining out","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health harming behaviours","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close interactions between food truck owners and customers","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of thermal imaging for temperature screening","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate information on maximum exposure time","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapid spread of epidemic in densely populated and well-connected areas","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of routine disinfection and ventilation in occupied rooms","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Whole-room uv-c system effectiveness against rna viruses like mhv-a59, mers-cov, and of covid-19 from real-life subjects involved in wearable technology experiments.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse health effects of uvgi on
